long_description:
You are now in a narrow pillared hall.  It is dim and decrepit.  There is a crack in the ceiling towards the far west end, allowing water to trickle down to a pool on the floor.  At the end of the hall is an overfilled bookshelf containing one oddly shaped book.

There is a door on the east end of the corridor.  There is a doorway on the north end of the corridor.
short_description:
Pillared hall with a pool of water on the floor & oddly shaped book on a bookshelf.
There is a door(exit) on the east end and doorway(exit) on the north end of the corridor.

Leak.name: Leak
Leak.description: This is a pool of liquid near the north wall

Odd Book.name: Odd Book
Odd Book.description: This is an oddly shaped book. Maybe it has some hints.
